name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 28, the Ministry of State Security said: "Everyone entering China will have their mobile phones checked." This is absurd. China is a country ruled by law and strictly protects citizens' freedom of communication and confidentiality of communication.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/XmkbCzKge1

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Currently the comment section has been cleared to 140 comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 28, topics related to the movie "Reinforcements Arrive Tomorrow" were banned, and the official Weibo account was also cleared. Some comments believe that this move should be related to the recent situation in the Taiwan Strait.
On the 27th, the Weibo site stated that in the discussion related to the movie, some users posted content that encouraged capitulationism, hyped up historical nihilism, and generalized attacks on my country's film censorship system and my country's institutional system, and the site took serious action against this.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 28, the scene was surrounded by iron sheets.
According to official reports, all five missing persons have been found, four of whom have been confirmed dead and one is being treated with all efforts.
A local chat record shows that the person being rescued is a child. At the time of the incident, the mother protected the baby with her body.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 27, Beijing National Bureau of Letters and Calls.
An old man cried out heartbreakingly on his way to petition, "My family has been destroyed and I have nowhere to go."
The queue of petitioners in the video is endless. There are even elderly people in wheelchairs. The person who filmed it said, "There are too many people. It's useless to queue for two days and two nights."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Taiwan's weighted index rose to over 21,800 points, setting a new record high, which aroused the sigh of A-share investors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
CCTV News responded to Lai Qingde and denied that the Taiwanese artists' statements were forced.
The article stated that Taiwanese artists expressed not only their recognition of their personal identity, but also their adherence to national justice. At a time when cross-strait relations are complex and severe, they bravely convey the voice of Taiwan's mainstream public opinion, triggering people to think deeply and discuss cross-strait relations, and fulfilling the responsibilities and obligations that public figures should have.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
There is no follow-up news about the incident in the Great Firewall, and no police report.
The only suspected news report on the Internet said that a witness saw the taxi abandoned on the roadside after the tire burst. The police responded that the man who committed the crime did not live near the scene of the incident, and other details were not convenient to disclose. The staff of Zhongshun Taxi Co., Ltd. said that the taxi in the video was indeed their company, and the police are currently handling the case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: NetEase and Tencent's reports were deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 26, in Hengyang, Hunan, a woman was hit on the head with a mobile phone by a stranger as she was walking back from buying steamed buns.
It was reported that the man was controlled by passers-by before he ran far and was then taken away by the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 28 (Release) Jiangmen, Guangdong. An Audi car drove in the opposite direction and knocked down a woman riding an electric bike, then fled. On the way, he found that the front license plate was knocked off, so he returned to the scene to grab the license plate and left calmly again.
The police reported that the injured person was not in danger of life, and the man involved was detained.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 26, Changchun, Jilin. The Wekawe Auto Parts Factory relocated. Dissatisfied with employee placement and other issues, workers returned to the original factory site to launch a strike to protect their rights.
According to local netizens, the cause of the incident was that the change of work location was not negotiated with the employees. "This unit has moved to the suburbs. If you can't take the company bus, the cost of going home may be half a day's salary."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/L9ZkuXuL3R

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Fengqiao Experience" put into practice
Recently, a netizen said that he was selected as a "safety volunteer" when he was riding a train and was pulled into a group, responsible for reporting emergencies in the carriage in a timely manner.
It is said that each carriage will have a passenger holding a full-trip ticket as a volunteer. The group will be disbanded when the train arrives at the station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 28, the National Security Department of the Hong Kong Police announced the arrest of six people, accusing them of "taking advantage of an upcoming sensitive day to continuously post inflammatory posts to stir up hatred among the public against the central government, the SAR government and the judiciary, and intending to incite netizens to organize or participate in illegal activities in a later period."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: May 27, Tianshui, Gansu. The Futian Tianshui Center real estate project has been unfinished for four years and has not yet been delivered. The owners knelt outside the government to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, Hongdong Village, Shantou, Guangdong. According to villagers’ complaints, village cadres sold their land without their consent, so the villagers came to the village committee and held banners to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of May 27, in Changsha, Hunan, the Jinbi Property Management Company of Hengda Mingdu Community charged unreasonable fees, and the dissatisfied owners marched in protest, chanting the slogan "Unscrupulous property management company, get out of Mingdu!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, in Yongjia County, Zhejiang Province, a villager posted a video saying that they had built a shed in an abandoned field to raise pigs, but the local village cadres demolished their pig shed without any documents, and a physical conflict occurred between the owner and the security guards. Afterwards, the villagers went to the town government to defend their rights, but no one accepted their case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 27, it was reported that there had long been a sale of children and birth certificates in multiple Baidu forums. The price of the child was publicly auctioned at 200,000 yuan. The buyer and seller communicated through code words, such as: LY = adoption, CSZM = birth certificate, antelope = adoption, Shanghu = household registration, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 28, Xinhua Times published an article saying that the best investment opportunities in the future are still in China, and ignoring China will only miss the opportunity.
This caused ridicule from netizens

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It was reported online that an explosion occurred in a dormitory of Chengdu Aviation Vocational and Technical College on May 24. The balcony and guardrails in the video were severely damaged. 
According to the information on the Internet and the screenshots between students, a student had a conflict with other people in the dormitory and suffered psychological problems due to dormitory bullying, so he made explosives and put them on the balcony of the dormitory to detonate. 
It is said that the student's parents had previously defended their rights at the school gate, saying that their child was crazy at school. 
At present, the incident has not caused any casualties.
